channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: NSA, CIA Respond to Reports of Concerning Chats in Federal Messaging System
Noem reveals major milestone on border crossings amid Trump's crackdown on illegal immigrants
item.description: Encounters at the southern border hit a record 15-year record low, Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem announced.

item.description: The House's version of Trump's budget bill advanced through a key hurdle before a chamber-wide vote.

item.title: Deadline for Musk's ultimatum to federal workers hits, but consequences remain vague
